data.name: Fantasy Grounds - Heroic Characters 13 (Token Pack)
data.detailed_description:
Heroic Characters 13


This token pack contains 28 tokens. This pack contains A variety of tokens that can be used as characters or NPCs.

This Token Pack includes:

  • Female Demon Kin Rogue
  • Female Elf Druid
  • Female Elf Sorceress
  • Female Feral Alchemist
  • Female Gnome Wizard
  • Female Halfling Fighter
  • Female Halfling Wizard
  • Female Xeno
  • Male Angelic Paladin
  • Male Bugman Engineer
  • Male Dwarf Death Seeker
  • Male Dwarf Lord
  • Male Dwarf Paladin
  • Male Dwarf Rogue
  • Male Dwarf Tesla Gunner
  • Male Elf Fighter
  • 2 Male Elf Sword Fighters
  • Male Giant Spartan
  • Male Gnome Wizard
  • Male Half-Elf Ranger
  • Male Half-Elf Rogue
  • 3 Male Kobold Fighters
  • Male Kobold Wizard
  • 2 Male Wood Elf Clerics

Released on March 28, 2017. Designed for Fantasy Grounds version 3.2.2 and higher.

Requires: An active subscription or a one time purchase of a Fantasy Grounds Full or Ultimate license and any ruleset.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7x , 8x or 10x
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7x , 8x or 10x
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
